title: Get Involved
intro: Join us in building stronger local communities. There are many ways to contribute your time, talent, and resources.

sections.title: Donate
sections.description: Your financial support directly funds our programs, from vendor mentorship to community events.

sections.title: Volunteer
sections.description: Help at markets, assist with events, provide professional skills, or mentor new vendors.

sections.title: Partner With Us
sections.description: Businesses and organizations can sponsor programs, host events, or collaborate on initiatives.

sections.title: Spread the Word
sections.description: Follow us on social media, share our stories, and tell your friends about local markets.

volunteer.title: Volunteer With Us
volunteer.intro: We rely on dedicated volunteers to support our markets, events, and programs.

opportunities.title: Market Day Support
opportunities.description: Help with setup, customer assistance, and breakdown at weekly markets.

opportunities.title: Event Team
opportunities.description: Assist with special events like the Night Market and seasonal celebrations.

opportunities.title: Vendor Mentorship
opportunities.description: Share your business expertise with new vendors. (Requires relevant experience)

opportunities.title: Administrative Support
opportunities.description: Help with data entry, outreach calls, and office tasks.

volunteer.formCta: Interested? Contact us to learn more about current volunteer needs.
